name: Cheating Death
description:
This game was an entry for Mini Jam (45), which is a biweekly 72 hour game jam. Each week, teams are invited to create a game based on a given theme. The theme for this weeks was "Dungeon" and "Pocket Sized".

Artwork by: Teshia Bennett 

Music and SFX: Ludovic Favreau

Programming: Nico Negron
